links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
prog: (PARI) list(lim)=my(v=List(),N);for(n=0,log(lim)\log(11),N=11^n;while(N<=lim,listput(v,N);N*=3));vecsort(Vec(v)) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Jun 28 2011(Haskell)import Data.Set (singleton, deleteFindMin, insert)a003597 n = a003597_list !! (n-1)a003597_list = f $ singleton (1,0,0) where   f s = y : f (insert (3 * y, i + 1, j) $ insert (11 * y, i, j + 1) s')         where ((y, i, j), s') = deleteFindMin s-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, May 15 2015
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
